name: MySQL5

getPSDEDataQueryCodeConds.customCond: ( t1.`TYPE` = 'story'  AND  t1.`BRANCH` = 0  AND  ( t1.`PARENT` IS NULL  OR  t1.`PARENT` = 0 ) )
getPSDEDataQueryCodeConds.name: 查询条件

getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.expression: (CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ZT_MODULE WHERE  PARENT = t1.`ID`) THEN FALSE ELSE TRUE  END )
getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.name: ISLEAF

queryCode:
SELECT
t1.`BRANCH`,
t1.`CREATEBY`,
t1.`DELETED`,
t1.`GRADE`,
t1.`ID`,
(CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ZT_MODULE WHERE  PARENT = t1.`ID`) THEN FALSE ELSE TRUE  END ) AS `ISLEAF`,
t1.`MDEPTID`,
t1.`MDEPTNAME`,
t1.`NAME`,
t1.`ORDER`,
t1.`ORGID`,
t1.`ORGNAME`,
t1.`OWNER`,
t1.`PARENT`,
t21.`NAME` AS `PARENTNAME`,
t1.`PATH`,
t1.`ROOT`,
t11.`NAME` AS `ROOTNAME`,
t1.`SHORT`,
t1.`TYPE`,
t1.`UPDATEBY`
FROM `zt_module` t1 
LEFT JOIN `zt_project` t11 ON t1.`ROOT` = t11.`ID` 
LEFT JOIN `zt_module` t21 ON t1.`PARENT` = t21.`ID`
